title: Release 1.3.2
text: Exciting News! Get ready for the next level of Minecraft with the upcoming Bewisclient update. Mark your calendars for August 20th, 15:00 CEST, as we release a game-changing update that brings Version Info Icons, reimagined notifications, detailed changelogs, a ping widget for multiplayer, a contact screen for support, personalized profiles, and bug fixes for a smoother gameplay experience. Don't miss out - upgrade and enhance your Minecraft journey!

title: New Discord Server
text: We're stoked to announce that our official Discord server is now live and ready to welcome you. If you're eager to connect with fellow Minecraft aficionados, stay updated on the latest happenings, share your insights, and be part of exciting community events, then look no further. Join now: https://discord.gg/kuUyGUeEZS

title: Custom Crosshair
text: Great news for Bewisclient players! The highly-anticipated beta phase of the Customizable Crosshair is here! Your feedback will help refine this fantastic feature. Elevate your Minecraft experience with personalized crosshairs. More updates coming soon. Happy gaming!

title: Two Bugs found
text: A minor issue has been discovered in the ConfigScreen, affecting the color display rendering. Additionally, the update checker has encountered a glitch, continuously displaying a new update notification. Rest assured, these issues will be addressed in the upcoming version. Until then, we kindly ask for your patience and understanding while using Bewisclient. Enjoy your experience!

title: New Options Screen
text: Experience the ease of customization with the new Enhanced Options Screen. Designed to simplify the process, this user-friendly interface allows you to effortlessly adjust settings. With organized sections, helpful tooltips, and a search function, finding and modifying specific features has never been easier. Personalize your Bewisclient experience with confidence and make the most of your gameplay.
